entry.title: $2485 // Park Slope Large No Fee OPEN PLAN 1 BR, WD, DW, walk in closet
entry.content:
Park Slope 1 BR Big Space and Great renovation, Laundry and Bike Storage

... If you're reading this, the apartment is available.
I delete my posting the minute that it is rented.
You can prove that you haven't read the posting
by asking me "Is it available?"

NOFEE NOFEE NOFEE

Renovated wonderfully with Windowed Walk-in Closet

NO FEE PARK SLOPE STUNNINGLY SPACIOUS , WOOD FLOORS)

... fresh and ready to move in July 15th.

Prime South Park Slope Near F trains.
No better location in Park Slope than this!
Right near our beloved Prospect Park !!!!!!
LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION.
Tree lined side street!

SUPERB RENOVATION
BIG BIG BIG HUGE COLOSSAL 1 BR apt approx. 800 - 850 sq. ft.
2 SETS OF WASHER DRYERS IN BASEMENT
BICYCLE STORAGE

with brilliant wood floors in LR and BR
quarry tile in kitchen

and an exposed brick mantle wall

and high ceilings!
and tall windows

and a well organized renovated Kitchen
Corian countertops! with better stainless steel appliances and better dishwasher
2 sets of Washer Dryer in basement

and TREES, TREES, TREES......

Bedroom has it's own walk-in closet with window. YES!
There's also and entry coat closet..
.. please see the floorplan ..

Park Slope!!!!!!! Park Slope is 15 minutes to Manhattan
and has a wonderful Victorian neighborhood feel to it.
Near health clubs, restaurants, Jazz clubs, Dance studios,
Banks, food shopping, food co-ops, subways. bus lines...


No pets, smokers, bad credit please .
